import React from 'react' import './Book.css' import {Button} from "@mui/material" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' const Book = (props) => { const {_id,name,author,description,image,price,available}=props.book console.log(_id) const delethandler=async()=>{ await axios.delete(`http://localhost:3001/bookstore/deletebook/${_id}`) } return (
By: {author}
Description: {description}

Price: {price}

Available: {available?"Available":"Not available"}
) } export default Book
